alert.note: Alert for Burlington; Monmouth; Ocean (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 16 at 8:28PM EDT until April 16 at 9:15PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mount Holly NJ has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Ocean County in southern New Jersey... Northern Burlington County in southern New Jersey... Southeastern Monmouth County in central New Jersey... * Until 915 PM EDT. * At 827 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Lumberton, or 16 miles east of Camden, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Presidential Lakes Estates, Wrightstown, Browns Mills and Presidential Lakes around 840 PM EDT. Cedar Glen Lakes, Whiting and Woodruff around 850 PM EDT. Jackson, Lakehurst, Pine Ridge At Crestwood and Cassville around 855 PM EDT. Leisure Village West-Pine Lake Park, Pleasant Plains, Holiday City-Berkeley, Cedar Glen West and Holiday City South around 900 PM EDT. Toms River, Lakewood, Beachwood, Leisure Village and Leisure Village East around 905 PM EDT. Seaside Heights, Mantoloking, Brick Township, Dover Beaches North, Dover Beaches South and Ramtown around 910 PM EDT. Manasquan and Point Pleasant Beach around 915 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Country Lake Estates, Silver Ridge, Brielle, Point Pleasant, Leisure Knoll, Nws Office, Crestwood Village, Gilford Park, South Toms River and Bay Head. This includes the following highways... New Jersey Turnpike near exit 5. Interstate 295 in New Jersey between mile markers 40 and 47. Garden State Parkway between mile markers 79 and 97. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
